sourcesContent:
Account Settings - Profile

Profile Billing Security Notifications
Profile Picture
JPG or PNG no larger than 5 MB
Account Details
User name is required. User name must be at least 12 character long. User name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "√±" and "√±" are allowed.
First name is required. First name must be at least 4 character long. First name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "√±" and "√±" are allowed.
Last name is required. Last name must be at least 4 character long. Last name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "√±" and "√±" are allowed.
organization name is required. organization name must be at least 4 character long. organization name must be no more than 25 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "√±" and "√±" are allowed.
Email address is required. Must be a valid email address.
Phone number is required. Must be a valid phone number.
Phone number is required. Must be a valid date.
Role is required.
Identification is required. Must be a valid identification.
additional info is required. additional info must be at least 10 character long. additional info must be no more than 50 characters long. Only letters, numbers, spaces, "√±" and "√±" are allowed.
